name: Video Game Package
summary: Learn about .PKZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open and view .PKZ files with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The format for a PKZ file used by one game may differ from the PKZ format used for a different game. Therefore, you may have to try multiple programs before opening your PKZ file. You can use custom scripts, such as chrrox's script for Spider-Man: Edge of Time, with Luigi Auriemma's QuickBMS to extract PKZ files.

Also, PKZ files compressed with Zip compression can be decompressed using a Zip decompression program, such as Corel WinZip, 7-Zip, WinRAR, or Apple Archive Utility. Simply rename the ".pkz" extension to ".zip" and decompress it. You can then modify the contents of the PKZ file, compress it with Zip compression, then rename the ".zip" extension to ".pkz".

description: A PKZ file is an archive used by video games such as Spider-Man: Edge of Time and Bee Movie Game. It may include graphics, textures, sounds, voice clips, and other game data. PKZ files are typically used by Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 versions of video games.
